definition: crotch/seat of a pair of trousers

sentences.english: How do I know she won't kick, or bite at my crotch?
sentences.chinese: 我如何確知她不會亂踢亂踹，或咬我的褲襠？

sentences.english: When he bent over, he split his pant .
sentences.chinese: 他一彎腰就把褲襠裂開了。

sentences.english: Fuck the priests who put their hands down some innocent child's pants.
sentences.chinese: 操那些神父，把手伸進那些天真孩子的褲襠。

sentences.english: The humiliation of drill bar Lord Onizuka is the crotch, save the lives of wuchang.
sentences.chinese: 槓爺羞辱的鑽了鬼冢正的褲襠，保全那五常的性命。

sentences.english: He came with an American flag sewed to the seat of his pants.
sentences.chinese: 他出場時竟然把一面美國國旗縫在了褲襠上。

sentences.english: I buy jeans with a low-slung crotch; I just like the look.
sentences.chinese: 我買的牛仔褲褲襠很低，我就喜歡這樣。

sentences.english: Its head went between my legs and its teeth dug into my crotch.
sentences.chinese: 它的頭夾在我的兩腿之間，利齒已咬穿我的褲襠。

sentences.english: There were grains of sand ih the crotch of her swimming costume.
sentences.chinese: 她的泳裝褲襠裏有一些沙粒。

definition: armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]
to make an exhibition of oneself/to be a disgrace
to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
to boil (of liquid)/boiling hot/Get out!/Go away!/fuck off (rude)
spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
to choke on (food etc)/to swallow the wrong way
